com.isoterik.mgdx.input

Class TouchEventData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.input.TouchEventData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Pool.Poolable

    public class TouchEventData
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Pool.Poolable
    Contains information about a TouchEventData. The amount of information contained is determined by the type of event that occurred. Mouse events are also treated as touch events

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TouchEventData.DataPool
      A pool for recycling instances of TouchEventData
      static class  TouchEventData.TouchEvent
      Types of touch events

      • sameEvent

        public boolean sameEvent(TouchEventData.TouchEvent secondEvent)
        Determines if the touch event that this instance contains is similar to a given touch event
        Parameters:
        secondEvent - the touch event to compare against
        Returns:
        true it the two events are similar

      • sameEvent

        public boolean sameEvent(TouchEventData secondData)
        Determines if a given TouchEventData has the same event as this one. Note: only the events are compared, the comparison does not include other attributes
        Parameters:
        secondData - the given event data
        Returns:
        true it the two event data have similar events
